title: Add incremental scanning for changed files only
description: Scan only files changed in PR/commit instead of entire codebase. Use git diff to identify changed files and their dependencies.

title: Add support for JavaScript/TypeScript scanning
description: Extend beyond Python to support JavaScript/TypeScript projects. Integrate with ESLint, TypeScript compiler, and npm audit.

comments.author: speed
comments.text: Scoped analysis: Requires Node.js 18+ in Docker, ESLint integration, TypeScript compiler, npm audit wrapper. Need new scan types: 'review-js', 'audit-js', 'deps-js'. Entrypoint.sh modifications for .js/.ts file detection. Estimated 4-6 hours implementation + testing. Consider priority relative to multi-repo support. Both are substantial features best tackled in dedicated sessions.

title: Add multi-repository scanning support
description: Enable scanning multiple repositories in a single workflow run. Support monorepo patterns and cross-repo dependency analysis.

comments.author: speed
comments.text: Scoped analysis: Multi-repo scanning requires matrix strategy in GitHub Actions workflow, not action code changes. Users can already scan multiple repos by running action in each repo. Enhancement would be documentation-focused: add README examples showing matrix builds with multiple checkout steps. Alternative: add input for multiple git URLs with clone logic. Estimated 2-3 hours for documentation approach, 6-8 hours for git clone approach.

title: Improve artifact handling with compressed SARIF uploads
description: Compress SARIF files before upload to reduce storage costs. Add artifact retention policies and automatic cleanup.

title: Optimize Docker image build with caching layers
description: Reduce action startup time from 60s to <15s by optimizing Dockerfile layers, using multi-stage builds, and leveraging GitHub Actions cache.
